thread.section_title: Tractive Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tractive | tractive.com
thread.title: Gill

author: Gill
title: Gill
text: I purchased Tractive GPS when my Jack Russell started bolting after fireworks frightened her. It works really well in my area and can see exactly where she is when on walks and can relax when she is mooching around in the garden that I will be alerted if she goes outside safe zone and I will be able to track her if she bolts. Customer service is also very good - waited 24 hours for response but not an issue for me and received good response. I don't think there is a phone number which some might find inconvenient.
